Home.headline: Master the Art of Flavor Creation
Home.heroDescription: Learn, create, and showcase your flavor compositions. The ultimate platform for aspiring flavor scientists.
Home.featuresDescription: Our comprehensive platform provides all the tools you need to learn, create, and showcase your flavor expertise.
Home.learnDescription: Access comprehensive learning materials, tutorials, and guides from industry experts.
Home.createDescription: Build and test your own flavor compositions with our intuitive creation tools.
Home.showcaseDescription: Build your professional portfolio and connect with potential employers.
Home.studentsUsingApp: A student is using the app
Home.platformDescription: Our platform provides all the necessary tools to succeed in your flavor journey.
Home.platformRecognition: Recognized by leading companies in the flavor industry.
Home.discoverCareer: Discover Careers in the Flavor Industry
Home.findJobDescription: Explore job opportunities in the flavor industry and take the next step in your career.
Home.jobListingsDescription: Browse the latest job openings in the flavor industry from top companies and recruiters.
Home.careerGrowthDescription: Gain experience, develop new skills, and advance your career in the world of flavors.
Home.industryConnectionsDescription: Connect with professionals, recruiters, and companies shaping the future of flavors.
Home.studentDescription: Gain the skills and experience needed to start a successful career in the flavor industry.
Home.joinOumamie: Join thousands of students mastering the art of flavor creation.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including when you create an account, use our services, or communicate with us. This may include your name, email address, and any other information you choose to provide.

dataUse.title: How We Use Your Data
dataUse.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, to communicate with you, and to protect our rights and the rights of others.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We take reasonable measures to help protect information about you from loss, theft, misuse, unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, and destruction.

cookies.title: Cookies and Similar Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track the activity on our service and hold certain information to improve and analyze our service.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@oumamie.com

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using this website, you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy.

userAccounts.title: User Accounts
userAccounts.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: The service and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by Oumamie and are protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

userContent.title: User Content
userContent.content: By submitting content to our platform, you grant us a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, reproduce, modify, and distribute that content.

termination.title: Account Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your account and access to the service immediately, without prior notice, for any reason.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: In no event shall Oumamie be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising out of or relating to your use of the service.
